datasets.name: sales_aggregate_core
queryLines:
SELECT 
  window.start AS window_start,
  window.end AS window_end,
  total_gross_revenue,
  total_net_revenue,
  total_return_amount,
  avg_daily_revenue,
  total_units_sold,
  total_units_returned,
  total_net_units,
  total_transactions,
  total_loyalty_transactions,
  total_all_discounts,
  total_multi_unit_discount,
  total_coupon_discount,
  total_loyalty_discount,
  revenue_volatility,
  transaction_volatility,
  revenue_range
FROM `prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog`.`dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_altria_gold_monitoring`.`fact_sales_daily_profile_metrics`
WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start`
  AND window.end <= :`Time Window End`
  AND log_type = 'INPUT'
  AND column_name = ':table'
  AND COALESCE(slice_key, 'No Slice') = :slice_key
  AND COALESCE(slice_value, 'No Slice') = :slice_value
ORDER BY window.start DESC

datasets.name: sales_derived_kpis
queryLines:
SELECT 
  window.start AS window_start,
  window.end AS window_end,
  overall_return_rate,
  units_per_transaction,
  revenue_per_unit,
  discount_per_transaction,
  multi_unit_discount_share,
  coupon_discount_share,
  loyalty_discount_share,
  avg_items_per_transaction,
  discount_intensity,
  avg_discount_per_transaction,
  loyalty_member_avg_spend,
  loyalty_transaction_frequency
FROM `prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog`.`dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_altria_gold_monitoring`.`fact_sales_daily_profile_metrics`
WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start`
  AND window.end <= :`Time Window End`
  AND log_type = 'INPUT'
  AND column_name = ':table'
  AND COALESCE(slice_key, 'No Slice') = :slice_key
  AND COALESCE(slice_value, 'No Slice') = :slice_value
ORDER BY window.start DESC

datasets.name: sales_data_quality
queryLines:
SELECT 
  window.start AS window_start,
  window.end AS window_end,
  total_records,
  null_rate_loyalty_customers,
  zero_revenue_records,
  negative_revenue_records,
  high_value_transaction_pct
FROM `prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog`.`dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_altria_gold_monitoring`.`fact_sales_daily_profile_metrics`
WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start`
  AND window.end <= :`Time Window End`
  AND log_type = 'INPUT'
  AND column_name = ':table'
  AND COALESCE(slice_key, 'No Slice') = :slice_key
  AND COALESCE(slice_value, 'No Slice') = :slice_value
ORDER BY window.start DESC

datasets.name: sales_drift_metrics
queryLines:
SELECT 
  window.start AS window_start,
  drift_type,
  revenue_drift_pct,
  gross_revenue_drift_pct,
  unit_sales_drift_pct,
  transaction_volume_drift_pct,
  return_rate_drift,
  discount_intensity_drift,
  discount_penetration_drift,
  loyalty_penetration_drift,
  avg_transaction_amount_drift_pct
FROM `prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog`.`dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_altria_gold_monitoring`.`fact_sales_daily_drift_metrics`
WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start`
  AND window.start <= :`Time Window End`
  AND drift_type = 'CONSECUTIVE'
  AND column_name = ':table'
  AND COALESCE(slice_key, 'No Slice') = :slice_key
  AND COALESCE(slice_value, 'No Slice') = :slice_value
ORDER BY window.start

datasets.name: distinct_slice_key
queryLines:
WITH profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM `prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog`.`dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_altria_gold_monitoring`.`fact_sales_daily_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` 
    AND window.end <= :`Time Window End`
    AND slice_key IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT 'No Slice' AS `Slice Key`
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT slice_key AS `Slice Key`
FROM profile_metrics_inspected
ORDER BY `Slice Key`

datasets.name: distinct_slice_value
queryLines:
WITH profile_metrics_inspected AS (
  SELECT *,
  COALESCE(slice_key, 'No Slice') AS `Slice key`
  FROM `prashanth_subrahmanyam_catalog`.`dev_prashanth_subrahmanyam_altria_gold_monitoring`.`fact_sales_daily_profile_metrics`
  WHERE window.start >= :`Time Window Start` 
    AND window.end <= :`Time Window End`
    AND slice_value IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT 'No Slice' AS `Slice Value`
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT slice_value AS `Slice Value`
FROM profile_metrics_inspected
WHERE `Slice key` = :slice_key
ORDER BY `Slice Value`
